items.name: Watch the Video (content page)
items.text: Watch the video and be ready to answer questions.

items.name: Answer the question I (multichoice)
items.text: What happens after the young man with dreadlocks sees the big man leaning on the red sports car?
answers: He helps the big man by giving him a ride in his truck.
He mistakenly thinks the big man is trying to push the car off the cliff and helps push it off.
He calls for help because he thinks the big man is in trouble.
He ignores the big man and continues driving his truck.

items.name: Answer the question II (multichoice + image)
items.text: What does the young man with dreadlocks do after stopping his truck?
answers: He offers the big man a ride in his truck.
He helps push the red sports car off the cliff.
He gives the big man a chocolate bar.
He calls for help to assist the big man.

items.name: Answer the question III (multiaudio)
items.instructions: Choose the correct answer. Use the mic to read it aloud.
items.text: What is the big man's reaction after the car goes off the cliff?
items.tts: What is the big man's reaction after the car goes off the cliff?
answers: He laughs and thanks the young man.
He gets angry and shouts at the young man.

items.name: Say the Sentences (listen and speak)
items.instructions: Listen and respond to the sentences you hear.
sentences: A big man jogs to his car.
He leans on it to rest.
A young man sees and misunderstands.
The car falls off the cliff.

items.name: Speak the words (speechcards)
items.text: Speak the phrases on the cards
sentences: A big man jogs to his car.
He leans on it to rest.
A young man sees and misunderstands.
The car falls off the cliff.

items.name: Type what you hear (dictation)
sentences: A big man jogs to his car.
He leans on it to rest.
A young man sees and misunderstands.
The car falls off the cliff.
